context.content: "What Women Want" is a romantic comedy that follows a man who gains the ability to hear women's thoughts. The movie combines lighthearted comedy through the main character's humorous and sometimes awkward interactions with women, while also delving into the intense drama of personal growth and self-discovery. The humorous comedy-drama elements come from the protagonist navigating his newfound ability and the relationships he forms along the way.

context.content: "Whatever Works" is a comedy-drama film directed by Woody Allen. It follows the story of a quirky, pessimistic New Yorker who forms an unlikely bond with a young, naive runaway from the South. The movie combines lighthearted comedy through the eccentric characters and their interactions, while also delving into intense drama as they navigate life's challenges and personal growth. The humorous comedy-drama elements come from the witty dialogue and the characters' unique perspectives on life.
